Title: Cinnamon the Movie
Description: ['Mocha, Chiffon, Cappuccino, Espresso, and Milk go with Cinnamoroll in this adventure of a lifetime. Join them in their quest, meeting new friends like Anna (the girl who found Cinnamoroll/Cinnamon) and discovering new places like the Forest of Pastries and Bread and the Coffee Waterfalls.']
Staff: [['Sugii, Gisaburou', 'Director, Screenplay'], ['Kuzuoka, Hiroshi', 'Storyboard'], ['TVXQ', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Okada, Mari', 'Screenplay']]
